sentences.en: ...aliens from another planet.
sentences.cn: …从另一个行星来的外星人。

sentences.en: alien beings from another planet
sentences.cn: 来自另一个行星的外星生物

sentences.en: alien cultures
sentences.cn: 异域文化

sentences.en: an alien multiracial society
sentences.cn: 一个多种族的异国社会

sentences.en: He quickly adjusts to the alien environment.
sentences.cn: 他很快适应陌生的环境.

sentences.en: He was always a stranger to me, always somehow alien and remote.
sentences.cn: 他在我眼里永远是个生人, 永远那么陌生,那么疏远.

sentences.en: If the latter is less'native'It'surely cannot be denounced as'alien '.
sentences.cn: 如果说后者欠缺本土色彩,也不能 说 它是外来的.

sentences.en: illegal aliens entering the country
sentences.cn: 非法入境的外国人

sentences.en: illegal aliens entering the country.
sentences.cn: 非法入境的外国人

sentences.en: Jim is an alien in this film.
sentences.cn: 吉姆在这部电影里是个外星人.

sentences.en: Leningrad was the third alien city to offer him a surrogate home.
sentences.cn: 列宁格勒是他在异地安家的第三个外国城市。

sentences.en: Orange trees are alien to China.
sentences.cn: 橘子树是从外国传入中国的.

sentences.en: Such an attitude is alien to most bu-sinessmen.
sentences.cn: 大多数商界人士都会对这样的态度感到陌生。

sentences.en: Such uses of fiction are entirely alien to Hawthorne's art.
sentences.cn: 霍桑的艺术与小说的这些用途是完全无缘的.

sentences.en: the alien environment of the city
sentences.cn: 城里陌生的环境

sentences.en: The effect was entirely alien from what had been intended.
sentences.cn: 这个结果与原先的意图大相径庭.

sentences.en: The sensory system may also undergo long - term adaptation in alien environments.
sentences.cn: 感觉系统对陌生的环境可能经过长时期才能适应.

sentences.en: The sensory system may undergo long-term adaptation in alien environments.
sentences.cn: 感觉系统对陌生的环境可能经过长时期才能适应。

sentences.en: The static, aesthetic searchings of the Cubists were quite alien to them.
sentences.cn: 立体派的静止的 、 美学的探求是同他们格格不入的.

sentences.en: Their ideas are alien to our way of thinking.
sentences.cn: 他们的思想和我们的想法不同.

sentences.en: They are alien people.
sentences.cn: 他们是外国人.

sentences.en: When war broke out, he was interned as an enemy alien.
sentences.cn: 战争爆发时，他作为敌国人士遭到关押。

words.tran_cn: 外侨的法律地位；外国人
异化；疏远；转让；[内科] 精神错乱；间离效果（alienation effect）
外侨身份（等于alienage）；精神错乱

trans.tran_cn: 外国的，异域的，陌生的，格格不入的，外星的
trans.tran_en: belonging to another country or race
someone who is not a legal citizen of the country they are living or working in

trans.tran_cn: 外侨；外国人的；不相容的
trans.tran_en: someone who is not a legal citizen of the country they are living or working in
